name: Expense Tracker.
description: Stop Wondering Where Your Money Went - Tracker Every Dollar in 30 SecondsFinally, Take Control of Your Spending – No Spreadsheets, No Stress, Totally FreeAre you tired of: Opening your bank app and wondering “Where did it all go?” Losing track of small expenses that secretly drain your wallet? Budgeting apps that feel overwhelming (and overcomplicated)? This free Notion Expense Tracker turns your financial chaos into clarity—in less than 5 minutes.What You Will Get Inside Expense Tracker Track E
features: Opening your bank app and wondering “Where did it all go?”; Losing track of small expenses that secretly drain your wallet?; Budgeting apps that feel overwhelming (and overcomplicated)?; Track Expenses in Under 30 Seconds; Smart Category Dashboard; Clean Gallery View; Fully Customizable; Clear view of your spending without doing any math; Track from any device – mobile, tablet, or desktop; Make better decisions based on actual data, not guesses
